articles.title: After INOX, PVR issues statement against digital premieres, expresses disappointment over direct OTT release - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: “We are disappointed with some of our producers deciding to go straight to the streaming platform/s,” said Kamal Gianchandani, CEO, PVR Pictures.
articles.content:

articles.title: Watch karna meri aadat hai: Anil Kapoor wants you to unleash the madness as Malang reaches OTT - India Today
articles.description: Malang, which had a theatre release in February this year, premieres on Netflix today. Anil Kapoor, along with the team, announced the news on social media.
articles.content: Missed Mohit Suri's Malang in theatres? We have some good news. Now you will be able to watch it at your home, for Malang just landed on Netflix. Malang, which hit the screens on February 7 this year, stars Aditya Roy Kapur, Disha Patani, Anil Kapoor and Kuna… [+2189 chars]
